## ChatGPT and chattr RStudio

* AI can be used directly in RStudio
* [RStudio 2023.09.1](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/) can use ChatGPT as an [add in](https://rstudio.github.io/rstudio-extensions/rstudio_addins.html)
* The [chattr](https://mlverse.github.io/chattr/) package is similar, but provides code-specific answers, links to other LLMs
 * Requires a credit card...
